alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 5:49AM CDT until May 06 at 1:36AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Baron Fork River at Eldon. * WHEN...From early this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs. Grazing lands near the river become inundated. Low-lying areas near Camp Egan may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
